body: Hi Xueting, Try the other component for occupancy generator. You can generate a list of numbers for 8760 hours of the year. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/VwTb9tHVOFvdJ1Lh49USw2P57eY-FQHHaQcnH60Y919Oq9zk4LDW4hPE6yMNRdAHNLD24yRQCDpiL9rK5pZ6VWZFqrM2B0Pd/occupancyBasedOnList.jpg) If you haven't done it before you can use duplicateData component to duplicate a daily schedule for the year and then use replace item to replace days for winter/summer break with 0. You may also find Ladybug DOY HOY component useful to calculate the index for winter/summer break.
